amendment.description: To strike the provision relating to the pilot program on privatization of the Defense Commissary System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4204 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 28. Record Vote Number: 91.

action.text: Amendment SA 4204 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S3491-3492, S3492-2503, S3504, S3525-3534; text: CR S3491) To strike the provision relating to the pilot program on privatization of the Defense Commissary System.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4204 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 28. Record Vote Number: 91.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4204 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 70 - 28. Record Vote Number: 91.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4204 proposed by Senator Inhofe.
